description.english: Collect 500 Rings. You can't ever have enough.
description.french: Ramasse 500 Rings. On n'en a jamais assez.
description.german: Sammle 500 Ringe. Du kannst nie genug haben.
description.italian: Raccogli 500 Ring. Non se ne hanno mai abbastanza!
description.japanese: リングを500コ集めよう！
description.spanish: Consigue 500 Rings. Nunca hay suficientes.

description.english: Collect 750 Rings. Where are you keeping them all?!
description.french: Ramasse 750 Rings. T'as les poches bien grandes !

description.italian: Raccogli 750 Ring. E dove li conservi?!
description.japanese: リングを750コ集めよう！
description.spanish: Consigue 750 Rings. ¡¿Pero dónde los guardas?!

displayName.french: Hop, hop, hop et on fonce
displayName.italian: In alto, sempre più in alto!

description.english: Jump 30 times. Up, up, and away!
description.french: Saute 30 fois. Hop, hop, hop et on fonce !
description.german: Mach 30 Sprünge. Nur Fliegen ist schöner!
description.italian: Salta 30 volte. In alto, sempre più in alto!
description.japanese: ジャンプを30回してみよう！
description.spanish: Salta 30 veces. ¡Salta, salta, salta!

description.english: Jump 100 times. Just keep going!
description.french: Saute 100 fois. Ne t'arrête pas !
description.german: Mach 100 Sprünge. Nicht nachlassen!
description.italian: Salta 100 volte. Continua così!
description.japanese: ジャンプを100回してみよう！
description.spanish: Salta 100 veces. ¡No te detengas!

displayName.japanese: ジャンピングマスター

description.english: Jump 250 times. You're blasting  off again!
description.french: Saute 250 fois. Voilà que tu fonces encore !
description.german: Mach 250 Sprünge. Los!
description.italian: Salta 250 volte. In alto, sempre più in alto!
description.japanese: ジャンプを250回してみよう！
description.spanish: Salta 250 veces. ¡Vas a volar!

description.english: Grab a ledge and climb up 5 times. It's climbing practice!
description.french: Agrippe un rebord et escalade 5 fois. Du véritable alpinisme !
description.german: Halte dich 5 Mal an einem Vorsprung fest und klettere hoch. Kletterübung!
description.italian: Aggrappati a una sporgenza e vai verso l'alto 5 volte. Pratica le scalate!
description.japanese: ガケを掴んでよじ登りを5回してみよう。よじ登りの練習だ！
description.spanish: Agárrate a una cornisa y escala 5 veces. ¡A escalar se ha dicho!

description.english: Move along the ceiling for at least 5 seconds. Acrobat extraordinaire!
description.french: Déplace-toi au plafond durant au moins 5 secondes. Comme un acrobate de cirque !
description.german: Bewege dich mindestens 5 Sekunden an der Decke entlang. Ein Akrobat der Extraklasse!
description.italian: Muoviti sul soffitto per almeno 5 secondi. Acrobata eccezionale!
description.japanese: 天井移動を5秒以上しよう。テクニカルプレイの練習だ！
description.spanish: Muévete por el techo durante al menos 5 segundos. ¡Presume de acrobacias!

description.english: Spin Dash for at least 2 seconds. Practice makes perfect!
description.french: Fais une course tourbillon pendant au moins 2 secondes. C'est en forgeant qu'on devient forgeron !
description.german: Mach mindestens 2 Sekunden einen Wirbelsprint. Übung macht den Meister!
description.italian: Fai uno scatto avvitato che duri almeno 2 secondi. La pratica rende perfetti!
description.japanese: 2秒以上スピンダッシュをしてみよう。スピンダッシュの練習だ！
description.spanish: Haz un torbellino durante al menos 2 segundos. ¡Practica y serás el rey!

description.english: Spin Dash for at least 5 seconds. Getting faster!
description.french: Fais une course tourbillon pendant au moins 5 secondes. Toujours plus vite !
description.german: Mach mindestens 5 Sekunden einen Wirbelsprint. Du wirst schneller!
description.italian: Fai uno scatto avvitato che duri almeno 5 secondi. Sempre più veloce!
description.japanese: 5秒以上スピンダッシュを継続してみよう！
description.spanish: Haz un torbellino durante al menos 5 segundos. ¡Estás mejorando!

displayName.english: Rolling Around At The Speed Of Sound
displayName.japanese: スピンダッシュマスター
displayName.spanish: A la velocidad de la luz

description.english: Spin Dash for at least 10 seconds. Spin Dash master!
description.french: Fais une course tourbillon pendant au moins 10 secondes. Le maître de la course tourbillon !
description.german: Mach mindestens 10 Sekunden einen Wirbelsprint. Werde zum Meister!
description.italian: Fai uno scatto avvitato che duri almeno 10 secondi. Sei un maestro!
description.japanese: 10秒以上スピンダッシュを継続して走ってみよう！
description.spanish: Haz un torbellino durante al menos 10 segundos. ¡Eres el amo!

description.english: Pull off a Wall Jump.  Serious ninja skills!
description.french: Effectue un saut au mur. Ça, c'est un ninja !
description.german: Mach mindestens einen Wandsprung. Wie ein Ninja!
description.italian: Fai 1 salto a muro. Abile ninja!
description.japanese: 三角飛びをしてみよう。三角飛びの練習だ！
description.spanish: Consigue hacer 1 salto al muro. ¡Pedazo de ninja!

description.english: Pull off at least 5 Wall Jumps in a row. You're getting good at this!
description.french: Effectue au moins 5 sauts au mur à la suite. Tu commences à prendre le coup de main !
description.german: Mach mindestens 5 Wandsprünge hintereinander. Du bist echt gut!
description.italian: Fai almeno 5 salti a muro di seguito. Stai migliorando!
description.japanese: 三角飛びを連続5回以上してみよう。できるかな？
description.spanish: Consigue hacer al menos 5 saltos al muro seguidos. ¡No se te da mal!

description.english: Pull off at least 10 Wall Jumps in  a row. Wow, you've got skills!
description.french: Effectue au moins 10 sauts au mur à la suite. Tu assures !
description.german: Mach mindestens 10 Wandsprünge hintereinander. Du hast's drauf!
description.italian: Fai almeno 10 salti a muro di seguito. Ehi, hai talento!
description.japanese: 三角飛びを連続10回以上してみよう。これができたら達人だ！
description.spanish: Consigue hacer al menos 10 saltos al muro seguidos. ¡Guau, eres un máquina!

description.english: Pull off at least 20 Wall Jumps in a  row. That qualifies as mad skills!
description.french: Effectue au moins 20 sauts au mur à la suite. Un vrai pro !
description.german: Mach mindestens 20 Wandsprünge hintereinander. Irre cool!
description.italian: Fai almeno 20 salti a muro di seguito. Abile ninja!
description.japanese: 三角飛びを連続20回以上してみよう。免許皆伝の超絶テクニックだ！
description.spanish: Consigue hacer al menos 20 saltos al muro seguidos. ¡Hay que ser muy bueno!

description.english: Run along the walls for at least 10 meters. Who needs gravity?
description.french: Cours sur les murs sur au moins 10 mètres. La gravité ? Quelle gravité ?
description.german: Lauf mindestens 10 Meter an Wänden entlang. Wer braucht schon Schwerkraft?
description.italian: Corri lungo i muri per almeno 10 metri. Non ci serve la forza di gravità!
description.japanese: カベを10m以上走り抜けてみよう。テクニカルプレイの練習だ！
description.spanish: Corre por los muros durante al menos 10 metros. ¿Gravedad, eso qué es?

description.english: Run along the walls for at least 20 meters. Who needs gravity?
description.french: Cours sur les murs sur au moins 20 mètres. La gravité ? Quelle gravité ?
description.german: Lauf mindestens 20 Meter an Wänden entlang. Wer braucht schon Schwerkraft?
description.italian: Corri lungo i muri per almeno 20 metri. Non ci serve la forza di gravità!
description.japanese: カベを20m以上走り抜けてみよう。これができたら名人級！
description.spanish: Corre por los muros durante al menos 20 metros. ¿Gravedad, eso qué es?

description.english: Run along the walls for at least  30 meters. Gotta go fast!
description.french: Cours sur les murs sur au moins 30 mètres. Va falloir foncer !
description.german: Lauf mindestens 30 Meter an Wänden entlang. Beeil dich!
description.italian: Corri lungo i muri per almeno 30 metri. Bisogna andare veloci!
description.japanese: カベを30m以上走り抜けてみよう。これができたら超人級！
description.spanish: Corre por los muros durante al menos 30 metros. ¡Tienes que ser rápido!

displayName.japanese: 美しいスピンダッシュ

description.english: Defeat 10 enemies with the Spin Dash.
description.french: Bats 10 ennemis avec une course tourbillon.
description.german: Besiege 10 Feinde mit dem Wirbelsprint.
description.italian: Sconfiggi 10 nemici con lo scatto avvitato.
description.japanese: スピンダッシュで敵を10体倒そう！
description.spanish: Derrota a 10 enemigos con el torbellino.

displayName.japanese: 華麗なスピンダッシュ

description.spanish: Derrota a 20 enemigos con el torbellino.

description.english: Defeat 30 enemies with the Spin Dash.
description.french: Bats 30 ennemis avec une course tourbillon.
description.german: Besiege 30 Feinde mit dem Wirbelsprint.
description.italian: Sconfiggi 30 nemici con lo scatto avvitato.
description.japanese: スピンダッシュで敵を30体倒そう！
description.spanish: Derrota a 30 enemigos con el torbellino.

description.english: Defeat 10 enemies by Bouncing.
description.french: Bats 10 ennemis avec un rebond.
description.german: Besiege 10 Feinde mit Stampfen.
description.italian: Sconfiggi 10 nemici con un rimbalzo.
description.japanese: ストンピングで敵を10体倒そう！
description.spanish: Derrota a 10 enemigos con rebotes.

displayName.japanese: ストンピングヒーロー

description.english: Defeat 20 enemies by Bouncing.
description.french: Bats 20 ennemis avec un rebond.
description.german: Besiege 20 Feinde mit Stampfen.
description.italian: Sconfiggi 20 nemici con un rimbalzo.
description.japanese: ストンピングで敵を20体倒そう！
description.spanish: Derrota a 20 enemigos con rebotes.

displayName.japanese: ストンピングマスター

description.english: Defeat 30 enemies by Bouncing.
description.french: Bats 30 ennemis avec un rebond.
description.german: Besiege 30 Feinde mit Stampfen.
description.italian: Sconfiggi 30 nemici con un rimbalzo.
description.japanese: ストンピングで敵を30体倒そう！
description.spanish: Derrota a 30 enemigos con rebotes.

description.english: In a single attack, use 3 or more lock-ons to defeat one or more enemies.
description.french: En une seule attaque, vaincs un ou plusieurs ennemis avec au moins 3 cibles.
description.german: Visiere bei einem einzigen Angriff 3 oder mehr Ziele an, um einen oder mehrere Gegner zu besiegen.
description.italian: In un singolo attacco, aggancia almeno 3 bersagli e sconfiggi almeno un nemico.
description.japanese: 1回の攻撃で3回以上のロックオンを使って1体以上の敵を倒そう！
description.spanish: Fija en un solo ataque 3 o más veces a uno o varios enemigos para derrotarlos.

description.english: In a single attack, use 4 or more lock-ons to defeat one or more enemies.
description.french: En une seule attaque, vaincs un ou plusieurs ennemis avec au moins 4 cibles.
description.german: Visiere bei einem einzigen Angriff 4 oder mehr Ziele an, um einen oder mehrere Gegner zu besiegen.
description.italian: In un singolo attacco, aggancia almeno 4 bersagli e sconfiggi almeno un nemico.
description.japanese: 1回の攻撃で4回以上のロックオンを使って1体以上の敵を倒そう！
description.spanish: En un solo ataque, usa la fijación 4 o más veces para derrotar a un enemigo o más.

description.english: In a single attack, use 6 or more lock-ons to defeat one or more enemies.
description.french: En une seule attaque, vaincs un ou plusieurs ennemis avec au moins 6 cibles.
description.german: Visiere bei einem einzigen Angriff 6 oder mehr Ziele an, um einen oder mehrere Gegner zu besiegen.
description.italian: In un singolo attacco, aggancia almeno 6 bersagli e sconfiggi almeno un nemico.
description.japanese: 1回の攻撃で6回以上のロックオンを使って1体以上の敵を倒そう！
description.spanish: En un solo ataque, usa la fijación 6 o más veces para derrotar a un enemigo o más.

description.english: Kick an enemy into another enemy. Give' em the boot!
description.french: Envoie un ennemi sur un autre ennemi avec un coup de pied. Une technique de pointe !
description.german: Tritt einen Feind gegen einen anderen Feind. Gib ihnen Fersengeld!
description.italian: Fai scontrare due nemici con un calcio. Dàgli il benservito!
description.japanese: 敵をキックして他の敵にぶつけてみよう！
description.spanish: Da una patada a un enemigo y que se dé contra otro. ¡Dale fuerte!

description.english: Defeat 100 enemies with Kicks. Now you're getting the hang of it!
description.french: Bats au moins 100 ennemis avec des coups de pied. Maintenant tu es un vrai pro !
description.german: Besiege 100 Feinde mit Tritten. Jetzt hast du den Dreh raus!
description.italian: Sconfiggi 100 nemici con i calci. Ci stai prendendo la mano!
description.japanese: 敵をキックして他の敵を100体倒そう！
description.spanish: Derrota a 100 enemigos con patadas. ¡Ya le vas pillando el tranquillo!

description.english: Multi Lock-on to a single enemy and defeat it with a powerful Homing Attack.
description.french: Verrouille un ennemi avec plusieurs cibles et bats-le avec une puissante attaque téléguidée.
description.german: Visiere einen einzigen Feind mehrfach an und besiege ihn mit einem starken Verfolgungsangriff.
description.italian: Aggancia più volte un nemico e sconfiggilo con un potente attacco a ricerca.
description.japanese: 1体の敵にマルチロックオンしてパワーホーミングアタックで敵を倒そう
description.spanish: Fija a un único enemigo varias veces y derrótalo con un poderoso ataque teledirigido.

description.english: Defeat 50 enemies. This is what you've trained for!
description.french: Bats 50 ennemis. C'est pour ça que tu t'es entraîné !
description.german: Besiege 50 Feinde. Dafür hast du trainiert!
description.italian: Sconfiggi 50 nemici. È per questo che hai fatto pratica!
description.japanese: 敵を50体倒そう！
description.spanish: Derrota a 50 enemigos. ¡Que se note lo que has entrenado!

displayName.japanese: 凄いエネミーバスター

description.english: Defeat 75 enemies. This is what you've trained for!
description.french: Bats 75 ennemis. C'est pour ça que tu t'es entraîné !
description.german: Besiege 75 Feinde. Dafür hast du trainiert!
description.italian: Sconfiggi 75 nemici. È per questo che hai fatto pratica!
description.japanese: 敵を75体倒そう！
description.spanish: Derrota a 75 enemigos. ¡Que se note lo que has entrenado!

displayName.japanese: 強靭なエネミーバスター

description.english: Defeat 100 enemies. You're really getting the hang of this!
description.french: Bats 100 ennemis. Tu commences à t'y connaître !
description.german: Besiege 100 Feinde. Du hast den Dreh raus!
description.italian: Sconfiggi 100 nemici. Ora sì che ci sai fare!
description.japanese: 敵を100体倒そう！
description.spanish: Derrota a 100 enemigos. ¡Le estás cogiendo el tranquillo!

displayName.japanese: 極上のエネミーバスター

description.english: Defeat 200 enemies. They didn't know what hit 'em!
description.french: Bats 200 ennemis. Ils ne vont rien comprendre !
description.german: Besiege 200 Feinde. Die werden sich wundern!
description.italian: Sconfiggi 200 nemici. Non sanno cosa li aspetta!
description.japanese: 敵を200体倒そう！
description.spanish: Derrota a 200 enemigos. ¡No podrán reaccionar!

displayName.japanese: 真のエネミーバスター

description.english: Defeat 250 enemies. This is what you've trained for!
description.french: Bats 250 ennemis. C'est pour ça que tu t'es entraîné !
description.german: Besiege 250 Feinde. Dafür hast du trainiert!
description.italian: Sconfiggi 250 nemici. È per questo che hai fatto pratica!
description.japanese: 敵を250体倒そう！
description.spanish: Derrota a 250 enemigos. ¡Que se note lo que has entrenado!

description.english: Defeat 300 enemies. This is what you've trained for!
description.french: Bats 300 ennemis. C'est pour ça que tu t'es entraîné !
description.german: Besiege 300 Feinde. Dafür hast du trainiert!
description.italian: Sconfiggi 300 nemici. È per questo che hai fatto pratica!
description.japanese: 敵を300体倒そう！
description.spanish: Derrota a 300 enemigos. ¡Que se note lo que has entrenado!

description.english: Can you find 3 1-Ups? You can never have too many!
description.french: Peux-tu trouver 3 vies ? Plus il y en a, mieux c'est !
description.german: Kannst du 3 1 UPs finden? Du kannst nie genug haben!
description.italian: Trova 3 +1! Non se ne hanno mai abbastanza!
description.japanese: 「1UP」を3コ探してみよう！
description.spanish: ¿Podrás encontrar tres 1+? ¡Siempre viene bien tener de más!

description.english: Can you find 6 1-Ups? Keep going!
description.french: Peux-tu trouver 6 vies ? Va donc voir !
description.german: Kannst du 6 1 UPs finden? Mach weiter!
description.italian: Trova 6 +1! Continua così!
description.japanese: 「1UP」を6コ探してみよう！
description.spanish: ¿Podrás encontrar seis 1+? ¡Sigue así!

description.english: Can you find 9 1-Ups? Keep coming back for more!
description.french: Peux-tu trouver 9 vies ? Reviens en chercher d'autres !
description.german: Kannst du 9 1 UPs finden? Hol dir noch mehr!
description.italian: Trova 9 +1! Non puoi farne a meno!
description.japanese: 「1UP」を9コ探してみよう！
description.spanish: ¿Podrás encontrar nueve 1+? ¡No dejes de buscar!

description.english: Defeat 20 enemies with the Cyan Laser.
description.french: Bats 20 ennemis avec le laser cyan.
description.german: Besiege 20 Feinde mit dem türkisen Laser.
description.italian: Sconfiggi 20 nemici con il laser azzurro.
description.japanese: シアン・レーザーで敵を20体倒そう！
description.spanish: Derrota a 20 enemigos con el láser cian.

displayName.japanese: レーザー・リングスター

description.english: Collect 10 Rings with the Cyan Laser.
description.french: Ramasse 10 Rings avec le laser cyan.
description.german: Sammle 10 Ringe mit dem türkisen Laser.
description.italian: Raccogli 10 Ring con il laser azzurro.
description.japanese: シアン・レーザーでリングを10コ集めてみよう！
description.spanish: Consigue 10 Rings con el láser cian.

displayName.japanese: レーザー・リングマスター

description.english: Collect 50 Rings with the Cyan Laser.
description.french: Ramasse 50 Rings avec le laser cyan.

description.italian: Raccogli 50 Ring con il laser azzurro.
description.japanese: シアン・レーザーでリングを50コ集めてみよう！
description.spanish: Consigue 50 Rings con el láser cian.

description.english: Wreak havoc for at least 30 seconds with the Yellow Drill.
description.french: Fais des ravages pendant au moins 30 secondes avec la vrille jaune.
description.german: Richte mindestens 30 Sekunden lang Verwüstung mit dem gelben Bohrer an.
description.italian: Crea scompiglio per almeno 30 secondi con la trivella gialla.
description.japanese: イエロー・ドリルで30秒以上あばれよう！
description.spanish: Siembra el caos durante al menos 30 segundos con el taladro amarillo.

description.english: Perform 5 Drill Jumps with the Yellow Drill.
description.french: Fais 5 sauts vrillés avec la vrille jaune.
description.german: Führe 5 Bohrer-Sprünge mit dem gelben Bohrer aus.
description.italian: Realizza 5 salti trivella con la trivella gialla.
description.japanese: イエロー・ドリルでドリルジャンプを5回してみよう！
description.spanish: Realiza 5 saltos de taladro con el taladro amarillo.

displayName.japanese: ドリルジャンプの達人

description.french: Fais 10 sauts vrillés avec la vrille jaune.

description.english: Use the Indigo Asteroid to find a bonus room.

description.japanese: インディゴ・アステロイドでボーナス部屋をみつけてみよう！

description.english: Defeat an enemy with a Black Bomb explosion.
description.french: Bats au moins 1 ennemi avec l'explosion d'une bombe noire.
description.german: Besiege mindestens 1 Feind mit der Explosion der schwarzen Bombe.

description.japanese: ブラック・ボムの爆発で敵を倒そう！
description.spanish: Derrota a 1 enemigo explotando con la bomba negra.

description.english: Defeat at least 3 enemies at once with a Black Bomb explosion.

description.german: Besiege mindestens 3 Feinde auf einmal mit der Explosion der schwarzen Bombe.

description.japanese: ブラック・ボムの爆発でいっきに3体以上敵を倒そう！
description.spanish: Derrota al menos a 3 enemigos explotando con la bomba negra.

description.english: Defeat at least 5 enemies at once with a Black Bomb explosion.
description.french: Bats au moins 5 ennemis à la fois avec l'explosion de bombe noire.

description.english: See if you can clear a zone without defeating any enemies.
description.french: Essaie de terminer une zone sans battre un seul ennemi.
description.german: Versuche eine Zone abzuschließen, ohne Feinde zu besiegen.
description.italian: Supera una zona senza sconfiggere nemici.
description.japanese: 敵をたおさずにステージをクリアしよう！
description.spanish: Intenta superar una zona sin derrotar a ningún enemigo.

displayName.japanese: ゴールボーナスの名人

description.english: Earn at least 3 bonuses when you reach the goal.
description.french: Gagne au moins 3 bonus lorsque tu atteins le but.
description.german: Erhalte mindestens 3 Boni, wenn du das Ziel erreichst.

description.japanese: ゴールの時にボーナスを3コ以上出してみよう！

description.english: Clear a zone without losing a Life.
